projects.title: DFS and BFS Maze Solvers
projects.overview: Processing program consisting of a custom maze builder and breadth-first and depth-first search maze solvers that utilize custom implementations of each based upon altered concepts within binary trees. More information can be found on the GitHub repo linked below.
projects.purpose: Visualized breadth-first and depth-first search algorithms in custom maze applications allowing for users to push the algorithms to their limits.

projects.title: 2D Platformer Board Builder
projects.overview: Processing program consisting of a overall world editor with additional block key and world map. Implements simple JOptionPane GUI to allow ease of use and devised custom import/export for world files.
projects.purpose: Enabled students in my high school's IB Computer Science curriculum for the past two years to build 2D world maps and implement their respective world files with ease using my custom JSON file structure.

projects.title: Robot Car
projects.overview: Improvised circuit consisting of a [insert type of chip] controlling the overall logic of the circuit that passes the logic of three light sensors through an outer circuit that is then routed into transistors for motor control.
projects.purpose: Designed to serve as a testing basis for my classmate's own logic circuits utilzing a quad NAND gate chip in my IB Computer Science class during our unit covering circuits.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.overview: Personal Website built using ReactJS and TailwindCSS incorporating dynamic animations through the motion.dev library and a custom hero section with a perlin noise lattice using the three.js library.
projects.purpose: Display my skills working with web frontend and expresses my technical skills along with my additional personal projects.
